experiences: Worked on a project of details update via file ingestion.

projectDetails: AWS Resource Setup and Batch Update Feature: Implemented batch updates using AWS services such as S3, SQS, and Lambda, enabling data ingestion via Excel files and automating the setup process. This reduced deployment time by 30% and improved operational efficiency by more than 50%.

Unit Testing: Wrote comprehensive unit tests for all functionalities, achieving 95% code coverage and ensuring system robustness and reliability
